comment: Will not be working with this season . It's been an amazing journey and am so thankful for everything I've learned in my time there . It really helped me establish a even more solid foundation in my understanding of wellness and performance optimization for esports
amr:
# ::snt Will not be working with this season . It's been an amazing journey and am so thankful for everything I've learned in my time there . It really helped me establish a even more solid foundation in my understanding of wellness and performance optimization for esports
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / work-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :time (s / season
                  :mod (t / this)))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (j / journey-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG0-of (a2 / amaze-01))
            :op2 (t2 / thankful-02
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG2 (e / everything
                        :ARG1-of (l / learn-01
                              :ARG0 ii2
                              :time (b / be-located-at-91
                                    :ARG1 ii2
                                    :ARG2 (t3 / there))))
                  :degree (s2 / so)))
      :snt3 (h / help-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / it)
            :ARG1 (e2 / establish-01
                  :ARG0 (ii4 / i)
                  :ARG1 (f / foundation
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / solid-02
                              :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 f
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / more
                                          :mod (e3 / even))))
                        :topic (u / understand-01
                              :ARG0 ii4
                              :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (h3 / healthy)
                                    :op2 (o / optimize-01
                                          :ARG1 (p / perform-02))
                                    :beneficiary (g / game
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Esports"))))))
            :ARG2 ii4
            :ARG1-of (r / real-04)))
